title: Mentoring Program for Online Science Lecture Development and Teaching Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in online course development and intermediate expertise in science
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments, emphasizing work relevance for current professionals

learning_goals: Participants design an online science lecture module and implement it using smartphone-based tools within one week.
Participants apply more than three effective online interaction strategies through peer feedback and mentoring.
Participants independently resolve over 80% of technical issues encountered in online instructional design by the program's conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
